title: Steal the Sacred Idol
content:
Steal the Sacred Idol Type Quest Act 1 Location Druid Grove Reward Ring of Protection

Steal the Sacred Idol

Steal the Sacred Idol is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Steal the Sacred Idol can be acquired during Act 1.Accepting the Quest

NOTE: This quest is only available while the tieflings are under threat by the Rite of Thorns. Once you speak with Mol and accept the quest, you may then stop the Rite of Thorns and still completed the quest.
